image_prompt: Dynamic pixel art close-up of the Pollinations bee wearing chunky headphones, tweaking knobs on a retro synthesizer. Sound waves visualizing as flowing lime green (#ecf874) and lavender pixel particles. Background is a glowing audio spectrogram. 'AUDIO MODE' text in bold pixel font. High energy, warm lighting, crisp 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley meets a rave. Cozy but energetic.
reasoning: Focuses on the most technical and enabling update (Audio Suite). Bullet points make the 'shipped' list scannable and impressive. 'Multi-modal just got real' signals a major platform evolution to builders.
